systems.name: Cards
systems.description: Credit and Debit card management system for issuing, managing, and processing card transactions

systems.name: 3rd Party Cards Systems
systems.description: Third-party card processing and management solutions for credit and debit card operations
systems.overview: The 3rd Party Cards system provides comprehensive card lifecycle management through external vendor integrations. It supports credit and debit card products with seamless connectivity to third-party processors, payment networks, and card manufacturing partners.

apis.name: 3rd Party Card Issuance API
apis.description: Issue new credit and debit cards through third-party processors

apis.name: Vendor Integration API
apis.description: Manage third-party vendor connections and card lifecycle operations

apis.name: External Transaction API
apis.description: Process card transactions through external payment networks

documentation.title: 3rd Party Cards Overview
documentation.description: Complete guide to third-party card management integration

documentation.title: External API Reference
documentation.description: Detailed third-party API documentation and schemas

demoLinks.title: 3rd Party Issuance Demo
demoLinks.description: Try issuing cards through third-party processors

systems.name: Temenos Cards Systems
systems.description: Native Temenos card processing and management platform for enterprise card operations
systems.overview: The Temenos Cards system provides native, fully-integrated card lifecycle management within the Temenos ecosystem. It delivers end-to-end credit and debit card capabilities with deep integration to Temenos core banking, real-time processing, and comprehensive compliance features.

apis.name: Temenos Card Issuance API
apis.description: Issue credit and debit cards natively within Temenos platform

apis.name: Temenos Card Management API
apis.description: Full card lifecycle management integrated with Temenos core

apis.name: Temenos Transaction Engine API
apis.description: Real-time transaction processing with Temenos integration

documentation.title: Temenos Cards Overview
documentation.description: Complete guide to Temenos native card management

documentation.title: Core Banking Integration
documentation.description: Temenos core banking integration for cards

systems.name: CRM
systems.description: Customer Relationship Management platform for managing customer interactions and data
systems.overview: The CRM system centralizes customer information, interaction history, and relationship management. It provides a 360-degree view of customers across all banking products and channels.

apis.name: Customer Profile API
apis.description: Access and manage comprehensive customer profiles

apis.name: Interaction History API
apis.description: Track and retrieve customer interaction history

apis.name: Lead Management API
apis.description: Manage sales leads and opportunity tracking

documentation.title: CRM Platform Guide
documentation.description: Understanding the CRM architecture and features

documentation.title: Best Practices
documentation.description: CRM integration best practices and patterns

demoLinks.title: Customer 360 View
demoLinks.description: See the complete customer profile experience

demoLinks.title: Agent Dashboard
demoLinks.description: Experience the customer service agent interface

systems.name: Digital
systems.description: Digital banking platform enabling mobile and online banking experiences
systems.overview: The Digital platform powers modern banking experiences across web and mobile channels. It includes features for account management, bill pay, transfers, and personalized financial insights.

apis.name: Account Access API
apis.description: Secure access to customer accounts and balances

apis.name: Transfer API
apis.description: Internal and external fund transfer capabilities

apis.name: Bill Pay API
apis.description: Bill payment scheduling and management

apis.name: Notifications API
apis.description: Push notifications and alert management

systems.name: ACH & Wires Payments
systems.description: Comprehensive payment processing for ACH and wire transfers
systems.overview: The Payments system handles high-value wire transfers and batch ACH processing. It ensures compliance with NACHA rules, same-day ACH, and international wire standards including SWIFT.

apis.name: ACH Origination API
apis.description: Originate ACH credits and debits

apis.name: Wire Transfer API
apis.description: Domestic and international wire transfers

apis.name: Payment Status API
apis.description: Real-time payment tracking and status updates

apis.name: Batch Processing API
apis.description: Bulk payment file processing

systems.name: Onboarding
systems.description: Customer onboarding and account opening platform with KYC/AML integration
systems.overview: The Onboarding system streamlines new customer acquisition with digital identity verification, document capture, and automated KYC/AML screening. It supports multiple product applications in a single workflow.

apis.name: Application API
apis.description: Submit and manage account applications

apis.name: Identity Verification API
apis.description: KYC identity verification and document validation

apis.name: Document Capture API
apis.description: Document upload and OCR processing

apis.name: Decision Engine API
apis.description: Automated application decisioning
